snippet: One of the only bars open in Rockaway has become not only a place to get a drink, but also a spot to commiserate and find support among those dealing with the aftermath of Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: One of the only bars open in Rockaway has become not only a place to get a drink, but also a spot to commiserate and find support among those dealing with the aftermath of Hurricane Sandy.

headline.main: What They'd Give for a Drink in Rockaway
headline.print_headline: A Place to Nurse a Beer, And Storm Grievances
